trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Audio reprezentuje wejściowych, który jest skojarzony z <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Aparat rozpoznawania mowy generuje informacje o wejście audio w ramach operacji rozpoznawania.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Aby dostęp rozpoznanym audio, użyj <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>Właściwości lub <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>metody <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Wyniku rozpoznawania może utworzyć następujące zdarzenia i metod <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasy: — zdarzenia:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>— metody:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > rozpoznawania A wyniku zwracany przez rozpoznawania mowy emulowanej nie zawiera rozpoznanego audio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Do takich rozpoznawania wyniku jego <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>zwraca `null` i jego <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>Metoda zgłasza wyjątek.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat rozpoznawania mowy emulowanej zobacz `EmulateRecognize` i `EmulateRecognizeAsync` metody <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasy.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lokalizację w strumienia wejściowego audio początku rozpoznanym audio.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość odwołuje się do pozycji na początku rozpoznaną frazę w wygenerowanym strumieniem audio urządzenia wejściowego.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Z kolei `RecognizerAudioPosition` właściwości <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klasy odwołania aparat rozpoznawania pozycji w jego wejście audio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Te pozycje mogą być różne.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zobacz [przy użyciu zdarzenia rozpoznawania mowy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>Właściwość pobiera czas systemowy na początku operacji rozpoznawania.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Lokalizacja strumienia wejściowego audio rozpoczęcia rozpoznanym dźwięku.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera długość strumienia wejściowego audio dla rozpoznanego audio.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Czas trwania w ramach strumienia wejściowego audio rozpoznanym audio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera format audio przetwarzane przez aparat rozpoznawania.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Format audio przetwarzane przez aparat rozpoznawania mowy.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Wybiera i zwraca część bieżącego rozpoznany audio jako dane binarne.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Początkowy punkt danych ma zostać zwrócona.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Długość segmentu, który ma zostać zwrócona.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca podsekcji rozpoznanym audio, zgodnie z definicją w audioPosition i duration .

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositioni duration zdefiniować segment audio poza zakresem bieżącego segmentu.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Bieżący uznane audio nie zawiera żadnych danych.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera czas systemowy na początku operacji rozpoznawania.

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość StartTime pobiera czas systemowy na początku operacji rozpoznawania, która może być przydatny w obliczeniach opóźnienia i wydajności.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>Właściwość pobiera lokalizację w wygenerowanym strumieniem audio urządzenia wejściowego.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Czas systemowy na początku operacji rozpoznawania.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje cały audio w strumieniu jako nieprzetworzone dane.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Zapisywanie danych audio `outputStream` w postaci binarnej.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Nie są dołączone żadne informacje nagłówka.

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Metoda WriteToAudioStream używa formatu Wave, ale nie zawiera nagłówka Wave.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera nagłówek Wave <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>metody.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Strumień, który będzie odbierać dane audio.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje audio strumienia w formacie Wave.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Zapisywanie danych audio `outputStream` w formacie Wave, która obejmuje nagłówka formatu (RIFF) pliku wymiany zasobów.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>— Metoda korzysta z tego samego formatu binarnego, ale nie zawiera nagłówka Wave.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Strumień, który będzie odbierać dane audio.
